delete.message: This is a custom DELETE success message for 'filter'
You have archived 1 dataset and can now find the dataset metadata in the Archived tab. The dataset will no longer show up in search results

releases.description1: The Gateway requires a significant volume of design and development work to deliver our vision and ambition. To achieve this our teams are continually working on the Gateway and deliver major software releases approximately every 4 weeks.
releases.description2: On this page we explain what new developments we are currently working on and list the major releases made since the Gateway was released in its current format in June 2020. Clicking on an entry provides further detail about the functionality that the particular release delivered.

cohortDiscoveryRequest.title: Cohort Discovery Registration
cohortDiscoveryRequest.text: Your Safe People status will be assessed based on your Gateway registered <userprofile>user profile</userprofile>. Please ensure this is complete and up to date before you submit this request and includes your institutional email address and role description.
cohortDiscoveryRequest.terms: You can review your terms and conditions <terms>here</terms>

profile.title: Your profile
profile.text: Use this form to register an account and update your account on the Gateway

cohortDiscoveryAdmin.title: Cohort Discovery Admin
cohortDiscoveryAdmin.text: Find and manage status of all Cohort Discovery users, Click individual account users name to access decision page to review and edit status

darAdmin.title: Data Access Request Admin
darAdmin.text: Find and manage Question Bank questions for DAR (Data Access Request) templates and applications

updatePage.title: Update a question
updatePage.text: This is a page for updating a question
updatePage.back: Back to Question Bank list page

createPage.title: Create a question
createPage.text: This is a page for create a question
createPage.back: Back to Question Bank list page

qbManagement.title: Question Bank Management
qbManagement.text: Use this page to list and manage all available questions currently in the question bank for DAR templates

create.label: Create
create.description: Create a new question for the DAR Question Bank

manage.label: Manage
manage.description: Edit, Update, or Delete existing questions in the Question Bank

teams.title: Teams
teams.text: Onboard and manage data provider teams on the Gateway

create.title: Add Teamâ€™s details
create.text: Add details of the data publisher team you want to create on the Gateway

edit.title: Edit Team details
edit.text: Edit the details of this data provider team on the Gateway

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.text: View, add, edit, archive and check the status of your datasets.

CreateDataset.legendIntro: You will see a legend to help you as you on-board your dataset metadata.
CreateDataset.submissionInvalidText: There are some missing fields that are required in order to upload this metadata. Please refer to the progress bar on the left for which fields are incomplete
CreateDataset.checkboxIntro: Select all dataset themes relevant to your metadata, this determines the metadata form questions:

checkboxes.healthAndDiseaseTooltip: Includes any data related to mental health, cardiovascular, cancer, rare diseases, metabolic and endocrine, neurological, reproductive, maternity and neonatology, respiratory, immunity, musculoskeletal, vision, renal and urogenital, oral and gastrointestinal, cognitive function or hearing.
checkboxes.treatmentsInterventionsTooltip: Includes any data related to treatment or interventions related to vaccines or which are preventative or therapeutic in nature.
checkboxes.measurementsTestsTooltip: Includes any data related to laboratory or other diagnostics.
checkboxes.imagingTypesTooltip: Includes any data related to CT, MRI, PET, x-ray, ultrasound or pathology imaging.
checkboxes.imagingAreaOfTheBodyTooltip: Indicates whether the dataset relates to head, chest, arm abdomen or leg imaging.
checkboxes.omicsTooltip: Includes any data related to proteomics, transcriptomics, epigenomics, metabolomics, multiomics, metagenomics or genomics.
checkboxes.socioeconomicTooltip: Includes any data related to education, crime and justice, ethnicity, housing, labour, ageing, economics, marital status, social support, deprivation, religion, occupation, finances or family circumstances.
checkboxes.lifestyleTooltip: Includes any data related to smoking, physical activity, dietary habits or alcohol.
checkboxes.registryTooltip: Includes any data related to disease registries for research, national disease registries, audits, or birth and deaths records.
checkboxes.environmentAndEnergyTooltip: Includes any data related to the monitoring or study of environmental or energy factors or events.
checkboxes.informationAndCommunicationTooltip: Includes any data related to the study or application of information and communication.
checkboxes.politicsTooltip: Includes any data related to political views, activities, voting, etc.

unarchive.title: Unarchive this dataset
unarchive.content: Select whether you would like to move this dataset to Active (this will make your dataset available within search results) or Draft (where you can edit the dataset metadata before making it available within search results).
unarchive.label: Unarchive dataset

archive.label: Archive dataset metadata so it is no longer live on the Gateway

TeamMembers.lastRoleAdminMessage: All team members must have at least one role. If you would like to remove a team member, the 'remove team member' button can be found in the 'Actions' column.
TeamMembers.lastRoleMessage: All team members must have at least one role. Please contact your team admin to remove a team member.
TeamMembers.noPermission: You do not have permission to edit this
TeamMembers.deleteLastMember: You are unable to delete the last member of a team. Please raise an enquiry.
TeamMembers.deleteYourself: You are unable to delete yourself. Please contact your team admin.

create.title: Integration
create.text: Input and edit the authentication information for the Gateway system to use for the integration.
create.helper: Entities created via an FMA integration can only be managed (updated or deleted/archived) via the FMA integration. Entities created via another method (manual, API integration) cannot be managed via the FMA integration.

apiManagement.howTo: How to setup and manage integrations
apiManagement.cannotCreate: HDR UK cannot create application registrations on behalf of users

create.title: API management
create.text: Use this form to create, update and manage your api on the Gateway

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.intro: Use this form to assign the right level of scope and permission for the application to manage integration and connect securely to the Gateway. Your application will only be able to synchronize data within its assigned scope and permission. Application permissions is the responsibility of your publisher team
permissions.helper: Entities created via an API integration can only be managed (updated or deleted/archived) via the API integration. Entities created via another method (manual, federated integration) cannot be managed via the API integration.

selectedQuestions.title: Selected Questions
selectedQuestions.description: Currently selected questions for your DAR template.

questionBank.title: Question Bank
questionBank.description: Other available questions you can add from the question bank.

home.flashyText: Explore the different functionalities of the Gateway
home.touchDevice: Explore the different functionalities of the Gateway
home.welcomeText: A knowledge graph to explore and access the wealth of health data and research from across the UK and beyond

datasets.label: Datasets / Tissues
datasets.title: Datasets / Tissues
datasets.text: A knowledge graph to explore and access the wealth of health data and research from across the UK and beyond

dur.label: Data Uses / Research projects
dur.title: Data Uses / Research projects
dur.text: Find data uses/research projects: Search and filter data uses/research projects related to specific datasets and other features

feasibility.label: Feasibility Analysis
feasibility.title: Feasibility Analysis Tool
feasibility.text: Compare the numbers of relevant records across different datasets: query federated datasets to find out how many records match a specified criteria e.g. the number of females with asthma.

dataProviders.label: Data Providers
dataProviders.title: Data Providers
dataProviders.text: Discover Gateway metadata providers. Search and filter resources by data providers and find out how to contact them

collections.label: Collections
collections.title: Collections
collections.text: Discover research resources: datasets, analysis scripts, software, data uses, and publications grouped together by domain, disease, theme or organisation

phenotypes.label: Phenotypes
phenotypes.title: Phenotype Library
phenotypes.text: Find reusable phenotype algorithms: Search and deposit human and machine readable phenotype algorithms

diseaseAtlas.label: Disease Atlas
diseaseAtlas.title: Disease Atlas
diseaseAtlas.text: The Disease Atlas is under development and is testing systematic approaches to understanding diseases across the NHS

publications.label: Publications
publications.title: Publications
publications.text: Understand what questions can be answered by specific dataset: Search and deposit publications which used a dataset or publications which describe a dataset

tools.label: Data Analysis Scripts / Software
tools.title: Data Analysis Scripts / Software
tools.text: Discover reusable community shared scripts and software: Search for data analysis / cleaning / transformation / standardisation scripts related to specific datasets or general software/tools

courses.label: Courses
courses.title: Courses
courses.text: Discover training materials and resources to enhance your data science skills for Health data research. Learn at your pace and achieve CPD certificates to showcase your personal development

saved_searches.title: Saved searches
saved_searches.text: Use this page to display saved search results and manage your saved searches.

deleteModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

delete.message: Your saved search was deleted successfully

status.500: There was an error when trying to delete your saved search

search.searchExplainerDatasets: Search by keywords, phenotypes, SNOMED code, LOINC term, Read code, ICD10 code, MESH term
search.searchExplainerDataUse: Search by lead organisation, data custodian
search.searchExplainerPublications: Search by publication title, publication DOI, dataset DOI, software title, data provider name
search.resultLimit: There are more than 100 results. We recommend refining your search.
search.publicationWelcomeHeader: Welcome to publications search on the Gateway.
search.publicationWelcomeText1: To start your search, enter a keyword at the top and select the search source on the left then hit enter or return.
search.publicationWelcomeText2: Gateway assets are linked to make it easier to find relevant resources for your work.
search.publicationWelcomeText3: Search Gateway for publications with curated linkages to explore related resources, like publications about a dataset or publications that have used a dataset.

dataset.populationSizeTooltip: Reported dataset population size in terms of number of people
dataset.publisherNameTooltip: Individual or organisation providing metadata on the Gateway
dataset.dataUseTitlesTooltip: Public record of data an organisation has shared with other individuals or organisations for the purpose of research
dataset.geographicLocationTooltip: The geographical area covered by the dataset
dataset.dateRangeTooltip: The time period the dataset covers. The end date may be empty depending on publishing frequency and data collection plan
dataset.accessServiceTooltip: The method through which a researcher accesses the dataset
dataset.containsTissueTooltip: Restrict your search result to datasets with tissue sample

dataUseRegister.publisherNameTooltip: Individual or organisation providing metadata on the Gateway
dataUseRegister.organisationNameTooltip: The name of the legal entity that signs the contract to access the data
dataUseRegister.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
dataUseRegister.sectorTooltip: The type of organisation that has signed a contract to access the data

paper.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
paper.publicationDateTooltip: The range of years during which results were published
paper.sourceTooltip: Select either to run your search against tailored fields in Europe PMC or search the Gateway publications

collection.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
collection.publisherNameTooltip: Individual or organisation providing metadata on the Gateway

dataProvider.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
dataProvider.geographicLocationTooltip: The geographical area covered by the dataset

tool.dataProviderTooltip: The name of the Data Provider (i.e. the organisation who facilitates access to the dataset)
tool.licenseTooltip: Analysis script and software usage restriction, using EU controlled vocabulary. <TooltipLink>(Read more)</TooltipLink>
tool.programmingLanguagesTooltip: Programming language used in developing an analysis script or software
tool.typeCategoryTooltip: Programming language used in developing an analysis script or software
tool.datasetTitlesTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed

DateRangeFilter.minYearErrorMessage: Please enter a valid starting year

PopulationFilter.includeUnreported: Include {unreportedCount} datasets where population is not reported

ResultCard.leadOrganisationTooltip: The name of the legal entity that signs the contract to access the data
ResultCard.datasetsTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
ResultCard.dataCustodianTooltip: The individual or organisation responsible for the safe custody, transport, storage of, and access to data

populationSize.label: Population Size
populationSize.tooltip: Population size associated with the population type in the dataset

dateRangePublisher.label: Date range
dateRangePublisher.tooltip: Start and end of the time period that the dataset provides coverage for

dataStandard.label: Data standard
dataStandard.tooltip: Data models standards that the dataset has been stored in or transformed to

dataProvider.label: Data provider
dataProvider.tooltip: Individual or organisation to be contacted for a dataset on the Gateway

accessService.label: Access service
accessService.tooltip: Method for accessing the dataset, if access request is approved

cohortDiscovery.label: Feasibility analysis
cohortDiscovery.tooltip: Indicates if frequency count accessible in HDR UK feasibility analysis tool

containsTissue.label: Tissue sample availability
containsTissue.tooltip: Availability of associated physical samples. Note: This information may not be provided by the Data provider

hasTechnicalMetadata.label: Structural metadata
hasTechnicalMetadata.tooltip: Descriptions and details about the tables and columns within a dataset

dataUse.projectIdTextTooltip: A unique identifier for the project assigned by the Data Custodian
dataUse.organisationNameTooltip: The name of the legal entity that signs the contract to access the data
dataUse.organisationIdTooltip: A unique identifier for an organisation
dataUse.organisationSectorTooltip: The type of organisation that has signed a contract to access the data
dataUse.nonGatewayApplicantsTooltip: The lead applicant or applicants named on the project
dataUse.fundersAndSponsorsTooltip: The name of any funders or sponsors involved in the project
dataUse.accreditedResearcherStatusTooltip: Specifies whether the lead appplicant(s) are accredited under the Digital Economy Act 2017 (DEA) as defined by the ONS Research Code of Practice and Accreditation criteria
dataUse.sublicenceArrangementsTooltip: Whether there are any permissions for the applicant to share the data beyond the named parties
dataUse.projectTitleTooltip: The title of the project/research study/request
dataUse.laySummaryTooltip: A concise and clear description of the project in language that is understandable to the general public
dataUse.publicBenefitStatementTooltip: A description of the anticipated outcomes, or impact of project on the general public
dataUse.requestCategoryTypeTooltip: The category of study the project falls into
dataUse.technicalSummaryTooltip: A summary of the proposed research, in a manner that is suitable for a specialist reader
dataUse.otherApprovalCommitteesTooltip: Other decision-making bodies who have also authorised the project
dataUse.projectStartDateTooltip: The date the project is scheduled to start or actual start date
dataUse.projectEndDateTooltip: The date the project is scheduled to finish or actual end date
dataUse.latestApprovalDateTooltip: The last date the data access request for this project was approved by a data custodian
dataUse.datasetsTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
dataUse.dataSensitivityLevelTooltip: The level of identifiabilityÂ of the data being accessed, as defined by Understanding Patient Data
dataUse.legalBasisForDataArticle6: Legal basis for provision of data under Article 6
dataUse.legalBasisForDataArticle6Tooltip: The lawful basis for processing are set out in Article 6 of the GDPR
dataUse.legalBasisForDataArticle9: Lawful conditions for provision of data under Article 9
dataUse.legalBasisForDataArticle9Tooltip: The lawful basis for processing are set out in Article 9 of the GDPR
dataUse.dutyOfConfidentialityTooltip: Whether confidential information is being disclosed, and if so, the legal basis for use of identifiable data
dataUse.nationalDataOptoutTooltip: Specifies whether opt-out of individual confidential patient information (for secondary use) has been applied to the data prior to release
dataUse.requestFrequencyTooltip: Whether this a 'one-off' data request, or recurring provision over a specific time period
dataUse.datasetLinkageDescription: For linked datasets, specify how the linkage will take place
dataUse.datasetLinkageDescriptionTooltip: If the applicant(s) intends for the datasets to be linked with any additional datasets, information on the organisations undertaking linkages and how the linkage will take place (including risks/mitigations)
dataUse.confidentialDataDescription: Description of the confidential data being used
dataUse.confidentialDataDescriptionTooltip: A description of the specific patient identifiable fields that have been included in the dataset(s) being accessed
dataUse.accessDateTooltip: The date the data access was granted and active research started
dataUse.accessTypeTooltip: Whether the data is accessed within a Trusted Research Environment (TRE) or via the traditional data release model
dataUse.privacyEnhancements: How has data been processed to enhance privacy?
dataUse.privacyEnhancementsTooltip: Description of the tools or software used to reduce level of identifiable data being shared
dataUse.nonGatewayOutputsTooltip: A URL link to any academic or non-academic research outputs, including code or software
dataUse.gatewayOutputsToolsTooltip: A URL link to any academic or non-academic research outputs, including code or software
dataUse.gatewayOutputsPapersTooltip: A URL link to any academic or non-academic research outputs, including code or software
